divs: Sighting DetailsStepped outside for minute to feed some feral cats and noticed a very bright orange light to the east just above the horizon, probably a few miles away. It was moving pretty slow towards the north, and I notice a plane with flashing lights flying less than a mile behind it. It slowly faded out, took about 10 seconds to completely disappear from sight. I also notice another plane flying from the west towards it.
Summary: Bright orange light, slowly faded out
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Hobbs
There were no other sightings in Hobbs on or around October 7th 2010
